column1: #Text=" Sokka says : " For now , you 're the Melon Lord 's forces .
#Text=" Toph says : " So I get to chuck flaming rocks at all of you ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Whatever makes the training feel more realistic .
#Text=" Toph says : " Mwah - ha - ha - ha !
#Text=" Toph says : " I am not Toph .
#Text=" Zuko says : " What are you waiting for ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " What 's wrong with you ?
#Text=If this was the real deal , you 'd be shot full of lightning right now .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm sorry , but it just did n't feel right .
#Text=" Sokka says : " There , that 's how it 's done .
